1.content:
Welcome to Hogwarts
For the sake of creativity you may follow the story laid out or make your own in the various AUs in the community
Remember your character is your own and if someone wants to continue their story please communicate with each other and comprise
And above all have fun
Now what time line are we
1.title: Introduction

11.content:
Are you a boy or a girl?
You are welcome to other choices
11.title: Gender

1111.content:
You are Alexander ‘Alex’ Blade
A 4th year Slytherin
Coming from a long bloodline of expertise, you are capable of many feats, stemming from the third branch of the main family your bloodline have been at the background of magical study unlike the other branches who goes into battle or diplomacy
however your reputation is forever tarnished by your older sibling who got expelled to Azkaban for being caught practicing the torture curse
In maintaining several relationships and have high marks you are seen as a model student but often rumors circle around you
Will you play as Alex and decide his fate
1111.title: Alexander Blade

11111.content:
You wake up in your bed groggy from last night of study
As you get dressed there’s a few notes on your nightstand
The first one is from Penny, a fantastic potions student and most cheerful hufflepuff you know, even though her over kindness is her weakness
The second is from Rowan, your first friend and major bookworm, she is in the same house as you, sometimes she can be too quiet
The last is from Merula, your rival and shares the same house as you, very driven and dedicated, you and her developed a mutual respect and rivalry to see whose best
11111.title: The morning

111113.content:
Knowing you spent the night studying with the other two, you decide to read Merula’s note
It reads:
Dear Blade,
I wanna see you as soon you read this, I want a rematch
Last week was a fluke and I’m sure you’re gonna lose
Meet me at the edge of the forest
It’s not like I need to see you or anything
Regards
Merula
Intrigued by her proposal do you go or turn her down?
111113.title: Merula

1111131.content:
Donning your favorite early spring clothes and thankfully there’s no classes, you decided to go see Merula
As you approach the forest, you see her sitting on a tree stump, blissfully singing and not paying attention to her surroundings
Do you sneak up or plainly approach
1111131.title: There she is

11111311.content:
You thank your lucky stars this week will be cool and dry
You crawl up behind her and listen to her song
As you listen closely there are two things
She’s sings like an angel sent and she’s singing a muggle song,
Being a lover of music you identify the song as You Make Loving Fun by Fleetwood Mac
11111311.title: Down in the dirt

111113111.content:
For the few minutes of bliss you let her sing
Lost in her harmony and knowing you adding your voice the hers will disrupt the melody
When the song ends she turns around to see you sitting there
She shrieks as your presence threw her off guard
“How long have you been listening?”
“Long enough” you reply with a sly smile.
As she gets up to leave, she scolds you, “I can’t believe you, I wanted to duel you but you had to ruin the moment Blade, forget this”
111113111.title: Let her sing

1111131112.content:
You reach out to her hand and stop her.
“Wait Merula there’s something I wanted to say”
She looks at you concerned and nervous
1111131112.title: Stop her

11111311122.content:
“You have something in your teeth”
Merula stares at you for a moment of confusion then rage
“What the hell, Blade”, she screams as she punts you in the balls.
You fall over clutching your bruised manhood. You look up to see her rant.
“I can’t believe you, I just can’t, ‘oh Merula you got something in your teeth’, fuck you Blade” after another swift kick to the stomach she stomps off.
11111311122.title: Dumbass

111113111221.content:
You lie on the cold earth contemplating what went wrong, although it was obvious
Being a model student, you just don’t know how to talk right, sometimes you wish you know how to do things right
You stagger back up to your feet and hobble your way back to the school
As you do you have a run in with someone
111113111221.title: You deserved it

12.content:
This is the modern AU at least how I imagine it
Magic is how we normies see it
Hogwarts is still a castle but instead of a school of magic it’s an elitist school of academic
Penny Haywood is the student body President of your year, have high marks in every class
Tonks is the class clown who manages to squeak by with her grades
Chiara Lobosca is a shut-in who is allowed her wolves at the expense of everyone else
Rowan Khanna is your first friend and the school’s bookworm even though she gets asked to leave the library for hoarding the books
Ben is still a coward and is called a mama’s boy but will rise to the challenge as long it’s not scary ie 98% of everything he can’t do
Merula Snyde is the school rebel rocker, she heads up her band ‘The Banshees’ with her electric guitar even though it’s just her and her friends
Ismelda Murk is Merula’s friend and bassist for The Banshees, she is a pessimist but sometimes optimistic about what she wants
Barnaby Lee, the drummer for The Banshees, enjoys animals and extremely oblivious to lots of everything, only god knows how he’s keeping up with his grades (seriously he could’ve been held back a lot)
So on and so forth I don’t wanna sit here and describe everyone, also the school’s main sport is cross rugby which allows girls and boys to be on the same team to play
To fill in the blanks you your own headcanons and be respectful of everyone else’s vision
Are you a boy or girl?
You are welcome to other
12.title: Gender

13.content:
Are you a boy or a girl
You are welcome to other
13.title: Gender

info.brief_description: Based in the Hogwarts Mystery time frame, this is if there was no Cursed Vaults
info.description:
This is an interactive based on the idea of the cursed vaults never existed in the first place
To know who many of the characters are go to Reddit or the wiki, the professors are somewhat the same
As for the content, this is a drama/comedy/romance
Sex is allowed
Fighting is allowed
Depictions of blood is allowed
And
NO DEATH
NO VORE
NO EPIC ADVENTURE
not everything in life needs an epic story or adventure
This story focus on your MC going through Hogwarts as a student
Feel free to be creative, just nothing that pertains to an epic, sometimes I’m sick and tired of reading epic stories
DISCLAIMER
ALL EXISTING CHARACTERS ARE PROPERTY OF JAM CITY AND WIZARDING WORLD
I DO NOT OWN ANY EXCEPT FOR MY OWN CHARACTER(S)
